entry.title: 工具推荐
entry.content:
工具推荐

搜索工具

Everything

下载地址：voidtools

AnyTxt Search

下载地址：下载最佳免费桌面全文搜索工具 | Anytxt
tips:可以搜索文件内容

压缩软件

7Zip

下载地址：7-Zip 官方中文网站
tips：免费开源

Bandizip

下载地址：Bandizip - 下载 Bandizip 安装包

截图工具

Snipaste

下载地址：Snipaste - 截图 + 贴图

PixPin

下载地址：PixPin - 随心截图，随意贴图

ShareX

下载地址：Downloads - ShareX

卸载软件

Revo_Uninstaller

下载地址：下载 Revo Uninstaller 免费版软件 - 免费和完整下载

Geek Uninstaller

下载地址：Geek Uninstaller - Download

视频播放

PotPlayer

下载地址：Global Potplayer

VLC

下载地址：VLC：官方网站 - 全平台的自由多媒体解决方案！ - VideoLAN

PDF 编辑工具

ilovepdf

地址：iLovePDF | 为 PDF 爱好者提供的 PDF 文件在线处理工具
tips：在线版免费

Adobe Acrobat

Stirling-PDF

地址：GitHub - Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF: #1 Locally hosted web application that allows you to perform various operations on PDF files

杂项

盘搜 VIP

地址：盘搜 VIP - 人工亲测精选的网盘搜索工具导航 - pansou.vip

奶酪清单

地址：奶酪清单（2024-12-31） - 奔跑中的奶酪

阿虚同学的储物间

地址：阿虚同学的储物间

steam community_302——加速工具

地址：steamcommunity 302 Ver.12.1.46 – Dogfight360

UsbEAm Hosts Editor ——多平台修改 host

地址：UsbEAm Hosts Editor [多平台 hosts 修改] V4.0 – Dogfight360

Nilesoft——win11 右键优化工具

地址：Download - Shell

cursor——无限续杯工具

地址：yuaotian/go-cursor-help: 解决 Cursor 在免费订阅期间出现以下提示的问题: You’ve reached your trial request limit. / Too many free trial accounts used on this machine. Please upgrade to pro. We have this limit in place to prevent abuse. Please let us know if you believe this is a mistake.

IDM——激活

Windowspowershell：irm https://massgrave.dev/ias | iex

office 安装与激活

安装工具：office tool plus
激活工具：massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts: Open-source Windows and Office activator featuring HWID, Ohook, KMS38, and Online KMS activation methods, along with advanced troubleshooting.

Windows 激活

激活工具：massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts: Open-source Windows and Office activator featuring HWID, Ohook, KMS38, and Online KMS activation methods, along with advanced troubleshooting.

Cursor

续杯工具：GitHub - chengazhen/cursor-auto-free: auto sign cursor

mind-map

地址：Releases · wanglin2/mind-map
entry.summary:
工具推荐

搜索工具

Everything

下载地址：

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
